nodes.name: Limit
nodes.notes: Limits processing to 1 item at a time to prevent API overload

nodes.name: AI Agent
nodes.notes: Uses OpenAI GPT-4o to analyze comments and generate insights. Customize the prompt for different analysis needs.

options.systemMessage:
You are a YouTube comment analyst. Analyze the provided comments and return a structured analysis with:
1. Overall sentiment breakdown (positive/negative/neutral percentages)
2. Top 3-5 main themes or topics discussed
3. Common questions from viewers
4. Key feedback points and suggestions
5. Actionable insights for content improvement

Format your response in clear sections with headers in json key value format and use underscore in the key name. Always use following keys for output json: 
1. overall_sentiment_breakdown
2. main_themes
3. common_questions
4. key_feedback_points
5. actionable_insights

nodes.name: If
nodes.notes: Filters rows to process only videos with 'Pending' status

nodes.name: Set Video Details
nodes.notes: Prepares video ID and sets max comments limit (100)

nodes.name: Get Youtube Video Details
nodes.notes: Fetches video metadata including title, channel name, and other details

nodes.name: Get Youtube Video Comments
nodes.notes: Retrieves top 100 comments ordered by relevance using YouTube API

nodes.name: Prepare Comments Data
nodes.notes: Processes raw comments: extracts text, calculates stats, performs basic sentiment analysis, limits to 50 comments for AI

nodes.name: Prepare HTML for Email
nodes.notes: Converts AI analysis into formatted HTML email with statistics, insights, and professional styling

nodes.name: Gmail Account Configuration
nodes.notes: Sends formatted analysis report via Gmail. Update SENDER_EMAIL_ADDRESS with actual recipient

nodes.name: Update Status on Google Sheet
nodes.notes: Updates video status to 'Mail Sent' to prevent duplicate processing

nodes.name: Pick Video Ids from Google sheet
nodes.notes: Triggers on new YouTube videos added to spreadsheet. Polls every minute for changes
